1.「何度も往復させて すまんな <pc>。| ふたりが 破邪の秘技の試練に向かう前:
I'm sorry to keep sending you back and|forth, , but there's something|I have to tell you before we head off to|
|test the secret of the Crusade of Evil.

2.「レビュール街道北の 王家の墓の下に| 人知れず広がる 迷宮についての話だ。: About the labyrinth that stretches unnoticed|beneath the royal tombs north of the|Republique du Repure.

4.「王家の迷宮……。| 聞いたことがありませんが それは？: The Royal Labyrinth. I've never heard of it.|What is it?

5.「王家の者でも 知る者は限られている。| 勇者とその盟友がそろった 今だからこそ:
Only a few people in the royal family know|about it. It is only now that the hero and|his allies have come together that we must|
|reveal its existence.

6.「今の ふたりの修行の場として| 最も適切であると 判断したからだ。: We decided that this was the most|appropriate place for the two of us to|train.

8.「アンルシアが 破邪の秘技を会得したとて| そなたたち自身が 強くならなければ|:
Even though Anlusia has mastered the secret|of the Unwanted, unless you yourselves|become stronger, you will never be able to|
|defeat the Great Demon King and his army...

9.「だが 王家の迷宮に 挑むことで| 勇者と盟友は さらなる成長を 望めるだろう。:
But the challenge of the royal labyrinth|will allow our heroes and allies to grow|even stronger. I therefore open the royal|
|labyrinth.

11.「扉の向こうは 王家の墓へと つながっている。| 中に入ったら 奥にある大扉をく:
Behind the door leads to the royal tombs.|Once inside, go through the great door at|the far end, and the labyrinth will unfold|
|beyond.

12.「……さて。実際に 行く前に| いくつか 王家の迷宮について| 聞いておいてもら: ... Before you actually go, there are a few|things you should know about the Royal|Labyrinth.

13.「この迷宮に入れるのは 勇者と盟友| そして 盟友の従える魔物のみだ。| 旅の仲:
The only ones who can enter this labyrinth|are the heroes, their allies, and the demons|that follow them. To enter the labyrinth|
|with a fellow traveler...

14.「それと 探索の途中で 迷宮の外に出る時は| この うつしよのカギが必要になる。: And when you leave the labyrinth during your|search, you'll need this key to the|Utsushiyou. You can leave it with them.

18.<color_yellow>迷宮に入るには 勇気の輝石が必要です。|勇気の輝石は:
To enter the labyrinth, you must have a gem|of courage. You can get 15 Sparkles of|Courage a week, and you can check the|
|remaining number at the Door of Light.

19.「ありがとうございます ルシェンダさま。| 私と <pc>のふたりは| 王家の迷: Thank you, Lucien. Me and <pc>|are going to train in the royal labyrinth.

20.「王家の迷宮は 未知なる領域だ。| 少しずつ チカラをつけながら| 徐々に進んで: The royal labyrinth is unknown. You'll get|better and better as you go.

21.「……その果てに 何が待つのかは| まだ 誰にも わからない。| 決して 無理は: ... No one knows yet what the end of it will|bring. Don't overdo it.

23.<color_yellow>光の扉からは アンルシアの|装備変更や スキル振り分: <color_yellow>From the door of light, you can change|Anrutia's equipment and skill set.
